alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 9:52PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 1030 PM MST... At 952 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Palo Verde Nuclear Generation Station to 8 miles north of Cotton Center to 9 miles southeast of Estrella Mountain Park. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buckeye, Gila Bend, Maricopa, Estrella, Painted Rock Dam, Bosque, Estrella Sailport, Cotton Center, Sonoran National Monument, Rainbow Valley, Ak-Chin Village and Mobile. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 116 and 124. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 44. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 119 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County
